mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (member_id, book_id, review_title, review_content, review_createdAt, review_updatedAt) VALUES (#{member_id}, #{book_id}, #{review_title}, #{review_content}, now(),now())
mapper.select: select * from review order by review_id desc
select count(*) from review WHERE review_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword},'%')

select * from (select ROW_NUMBER() over(order by review_id desc) as review_no, review_id, member_id, review_title, review_content, review_createdAt,review_updatedAt, review_views from review r) r2 where r2.review_no BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}
